Back To Recipes

recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

sushi rice 0.5 cup
water 0.5 cup
apple cider vinegar 1 Tbsp
seasoned rice vinegar 1 Tbsp
salmon 0.25 pound
seaweed 1 unit
avacado 1 unit
soy sauce 1 unit
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 52 Minutes

Recipe:

This recipe makes 2 rolls worth of rice
Rinse ½ cup sushi rice under water for 2 minutes
Put sushi rice in instantpot
Put ½ cup water in instantpot
Cook rice in instant pot on low pressure (Takes 12 minutes)
Let instant pot sit without opening steam valve (Takes 10 minutes)
Unplug instant pot heat
Put 1 Tbsp apple cider vinegar in instant pot
Put 1 Tbsp seasoned rice vinegar in instant pot
Stir instant pot mixture
Cover instant pot in tinfoil with poked holes and set in fridge (Takes 30 minutes)
Cook ¼ pound salmon on all sides briefly, about 2 min
Spoon sushi rice on seaweed leaving about an inch of seaweed uncovered
Spread out rice with spoon
Put avacado and salmon in the middle of the sushi rice
Tightly wrap and wet the uncovered inch of seaweed and overlap the roll
Put water on the outside of the uncovered seaweed aswell so it sticks
Optionally, if the sushi rice is still warm, put rolls into freezer for 5 min
Dip in soy sauce
